11232.content:
The dragon of Gensokyou, and arguably one of the strongest fighters in CQC (close quarters combat.) Hong Meiling, the guardian to the gates of the Scarlet Devil Mansion, could once again be found sleeping in that standing position. Why again? At this point, Sakuya was pretty much fed up with it and decided discipline was needed. Naturally, she goes with tossing a multitude of knives at her..... only for them to be dodged yet again. Meiling was just that good, so it was nearly impossible for Sakuya to get the drop on her. ugh.... Yet another failure to remind the green wearing dragon to do her job properly. And so, Sakuya leaves the area and heads back inside to return to her maid duties.

Once Sakuya was gone, Meiling was now there to do as she pleased. There was hardly anyone around, so Meiling opens her eyes, stretches, and then..... boing. Her large breasts bounce a bit after the daily stretch like they typically would. Being a natural E cup at the very least, yet their weight didn't seem to hinder her at all as she goes into a stance, practicing her movement and defense. "Hyah!" She lets out a series of karate yells as she does so, a thirty minute training session as she had dictated for herself. Once said session was over, she does her typical breathe-in, breathe-out motion to signal her training was over for the day.

It seemed like a very ordinary day, as was typical for this part of Gensokyou and the Scarlet Devil Mansion. Meiling was very ladi back most of the time, so it seemed natural that someone would be willing and able to speak to her.... which never happened except for Sakuya who was always scolding her for sleeping on the job. Today felt a bit different though. Meiling could sense something.... off. Attuned to her surroundings, she hears a noise. That noise is....

121.content:
The trouble began, not for the first time, with an apple.
They lay big, round and red on doctor Yagokoro's desk and, if they would have known the future they would have ticked like bombs.

The harvest season was coming to an end and Kaguya had been extatic to see the appletrees she planted from seeds roughly ten years ago where ready to bear their first fruits. Sadly, before the harvest could comence, a firery duel with her archnemesis had reduced the lovingly cared for plants to ash and Kaguya never had a chance to taste the fruit of her labors. Kaguya was inconsolable. Eirin proposed to visit the Aki sisters on Yokai Mountain to aks, if necessary force, Minoriko to part with some freshly grown Apples, or even easier, just send Udongein to buy some at the Human Villiage. But the princess sneered on those ideas. They needed to have grown here in Eientei soil. Apples that where as beautiful as her, touched by the eternity and purity of the moon, but still have their earthly roots. Not willing to put up with Kaguya's moping and whining Eirin proposed to help nature to speed up the process a little and grow some apple trees in record time. By some kind of magic Kaguya brightend up at the idea of having super trees in the garden and was happy to have Eirin have a go at it.

It took the better of the week to modify a regular seed into a super seed that would grow in an adult tree in days instead of years and another two sleepless nights to mix a serum that would trigger fertility in the soil necessary to grow such splendid plants without making them die by their own rapid growth. Poor Udongein was running ragged with all the errants for exotic materials and magic formulars. But on the second last day of Autum Erin had grown truly amazing trees. Eirin couldn't help but feel pride in her work, as she watched the apples gleam in the sunlight of the late autumn sun. But bevor Eirin let Kaguya harvest and eat those fruits, she wanted to conduct a few test on them, to make sure they where actualy safe to consume. Playing god with nature hat the unfortunate habit of sometimes exploding into your face with unexpected and unwated side effects. Like exploding for example. While Kaguya was indeed as imortal as any being could wish (or not wish) to be, Eirin had a trusty student/Guinea pig who could test them out. Of course Kaguya complained that she didn't get the first taste of her labor, but Eirin just retorted that it was her labor that grew those trees and she decided that Udongein had the honor to play taste tester.

"You wanted to see me, master?" asked a nervous Reisen. She didn't want to play Guinea pig for her masters newest shady sheme but what could a pet do?
"Have an apple, Udongein, and relax. I just have a few questions fo you," Eirin said and handed the rabbit youkai one of the apples. Reisen looked at her as if she had offered her a fistfull of spiders, sighed then and took the apple.
"What are you waiting for? Take a bite," Erin orderd. Reisen eyed the apple in her hand wearily. It looked harmless and innocent. Just a fruit. It had no sickly green or purple colour, nor did it glow in a concerning way. She closed her eyes and braved her first bite. Her mouth exploded with heavenly flavor. Juice ran down her chin and she greedly took another bite.
"My, my. That good?" asked Eirin and laughed. With a swift motion she stole back the apple from her student.
"Hey!" shouted Reisen angrily, "i was eating that."
"And i decided that you will stop now. You can have the rest later. So, how are you feeling?", asked Eirin and took a clipboard and a pen from her desk.

Reisen thought about it for a moment.
"I don't feel any different, than bevore the apple," she replied.
"Really?", asked Eirin and made a note. "And how did it taste?"
"Amazing!" gushed the rabbit youkai and bringing her hands to her chest. "That apple was the best thing i ever tasted. Do you remember the cake Tewi had made for the princesses birhtday? That! But times ten!" She started to feel warm. It spread from her stomach to her chest.
"What's wrong Udongein? You're looking kinda red? Are you feeling something now?" asked Eirin curiously.
"I feel warm in my stomach and my chest," Reisen said and started figeting. After a short while she added quietly "And in my... neithers..."
"Really?" Erin eyed her student.
"My chest feels... tight. It feels like with every heartbeat something flows into it," Reisen explained. She moaned. "It feels really good..."

Reisen started kneading her breasts earnestly her nipples getting erect and rubbing the inside of her bra. It was almost as pleasuring as rubbing her already moisteingn pussy. Heat seemed to spread in her entire body but centralizing in her for attention aching breasts.

Eirin, who had watched everything wide eyed stared at Udogein slack jawed. What the fuck had she created? Where the effects permanent? Udongein had taken only two bites of the Apple. What would happen if someone consumed a whole fruit? She stared at the apple in her hand. It smelled sweet and inviting, daring her to take a bite.
Eirin congratulated herself for her quick thinking of not letting the princess have one. Who knows what would have happend? She had to be quick before some fool could think about eating an apple without wating for her okay. She made to leave her study and rushing to the garden.
121.title: Eientei apples

1211.content:
Eirin hurried out of her study into the backyard garden of her princess. There she found that her worries where unfounded, as princess Kaguya languished in one of the loungers while the earth rabbits played between the trees. Eirin let out a breath she didn't realize she was holding. Kaguya saw her aproach and waved at her with an excited smile. She gracefully rose from her chair and strolled over to the porch where Eirin was standing.
"So, good doctor, are they safe? No nasty side effects?"
Eirin fixed her with a sirous expression.
"No one has eaten any of the fruits? No one stole one and made away with it?"
Kaguya's happy expression turned serious and she looked over to the playing rabbits.
"No. I forbid them from having any and i kept an eye on them," she answerd. Kaguya closed her eyes and sighed like a tragic heroine. "So the apples are poisenous? Thats a pity. How is Reisen feeling?"She sauntered over to the appletrees and plucked one.
"Well i guess i can give one to Mokou at least. That promises to be fun at least. How many Apples do i need to forcefeed her to die from it?" she asked Eirin.
"They are not deadly as far as i know, but if you don't want your nemesis to have a bigger bust than you, i would recommend not giving her on of those," Eirin said eying the apple in the princesses hand.
Kaguya narowed her eyes. "Explain," she demanded.
"I let Udongein only take two bites but her Breasts basicly exploded in size. They are now maybe three times their original size," Eirin explained in a hushed voice, "She was overwhelmed by brain frying plasure. She also started to lactade pretty heavily."
Kaguya stared at her friend. "Really?" The princess was at a loss for words. She stared at the Apple in her Hand.
"I suggest we get rid of the trees immediately before they find theire way into the hands of some unwitting fool that thinks that this side effects are very much worth it," Eirin said and shot a look at the watching rabbits. They had stopped their playing and waited for the two lunarians to announce the beginn of the harvest.
Kaguya sighed heavily again. "It's such a shame. All this work we put into this," she said and gesticulated with the apple in her hand, "and now we can't even enjoy them. But i see your point, those children really should not get into such a situation. That being said, can't we still safe some for... personal usage?"
Eirin looked uncomfortable for a second, like always when the princess alluded to her more... sexual interests. Kaguya huffed. Really, for beeing the greatest mind in all existance and her age Eirin was such a prude. It was a lunarian thing. Purity and the lot.
"I will have to complete an antidote first. If not just so that Udongein can return to a more normal form. I will grow you a small potted tree that you can hide in your room if you really are set to this, but leaving them here in the open just calles for trouble."
"Oh Eirin," Kaguya exclaimed happily and threw herself at her freind in a suprise hug, "You are the best. I will await the completion of the antidote with baited breath!"
"I really have to return to Udongein and come up with a way to quarantine her until i managed to fix her," Erin said, "can i leave the destruction of the trees to you?"
"Sure. It will brake my heart, but then again, i will get better," Kaguya agreed, "now what to tell the rabbits..."
Eirin shrugged and let her eyes roam over the fluffle of rabbits. They seemed to become impatient. "Just tell them they are deadly or..." she broke off. She turned back to Kaguya with a concerned expression.
"Where is Tewi?" she asked alarmed. Kaguya's eyes widened.
"I- I don't know... I think she was with the other rabbits? Do you think she has...?"
"She certainly would if she thought it was funny. If only to get a rise out of me. If you can try to find her and please discourage her of playing with this devil fruits, I really need to hurry back to Udongein," Eirin instructed and hurried back into the building, leaving Kaguya with the other rabbits.
Kaguya nodded to herself and began to adress the earth rabbits.

A few hundred meters away from Eientei Tewi Inaba giggled to herself. Other her shoulders she carried a jute sack filled with the new addition to her home's plantlife. Apples like these would sell for a decent ammount of money. If not she could pawn them off to some random youkai or fairy. But luck was always on her side, so she grinned to herself and made her way out of the bamboo forest onto the road to the human village. The journey took the entire morning but was uneventful. She passed the gate easily. while it was the human villiage no one payed the little rabbit any mind. Everyone knew about the doctor from the bamboo forest of the lost and the hundreds of rabbtis that lived there. She made her way to the market and picked a corner a little away from the other fruit and vegtable stands. There she started to hawk her goods.
Sadly their was no real interest in her little stand. Some child bought one for their teacher. The Girl with the bookstore, Kosuzu or something bought a four and then left. The afternoon draged on and Tewi made a few more sales. She groaned to herself. This sheme was a bust. She already wanted to pack up but was stoped by a voice.

12113.content:
Daiyousei was resting in the shade of a great tree near the shore of Misty Lake. the late Autumn sun gave her all one last time bevor Winter could truly begin, and she enjoyed the glistering of said sun on the lakesurface. In a few moment Cirno would arrive and they would spent the day playing. Daiyousei sighed contently and making her joints pop. She stood up and flew up in the air to watch out for her freinds outline on the horizon. She didn't have to wait long. A small figure zoomed in her direction, waving with something that looked like a big sack.
"Dai-chan! Dai-Chan! Look what I found!" Cirno shouted and showed Daiyousei a big jute sack. It was full of grass stains and ominous wet spets, but the aroma it gave off was so sweet and inviting that Daiyousei found herself drifting closer to Cirno.
"It smells good. What is in it?" she asked. Cirno grinned proudly waggled her finger.
"I'll show you in a second but let's go to our hideout first" the Ice fairy ordered. Daiyousei nodded and they flew of into the forest of magic.

The hideout was a sizeable clearing hidden by acient trees. Ivy and other creepers growing between the tree trunks build an natural wall that looked like a overgrown rock formation from the outside with only a small opening, just big enough for a fairy or other child sized youkai to crawl through. It became the base of operation for the two fairys and their friends. It offered privacy for their prankplanning sessions, as the leave roof of the surrounding trees shielded them from other flying passerbys and even the Rain had a hard time to properly reach the ground there. Only small rays of sunshine made it through the leaves painting the clearing in an otherworldly light. The mossy ground was soft and warm so the two fairy plopped down and Cirno finally revealed her findings. She opened the sack and showed Daiyousei its content.

Plump, red and shiny apples that smelled and looked absolutely delicous. Daiyousei's mouth watered just at the sight of the fruits.
"They look amazing! Where did you find them?" she asked her best freind. Cirno puffed her chest and put on an superior expression.
"I was wandering that bamboo forest for a while and i found them in some ditch.I think someone had forgotten them there. Today is sure my lucky day to have such great treats fall into my lap."

12113.title: A great find for fairys

info.brief_description: The girls from Touhou start to get a little top-heavy! Why? How? How BIG? You decide!
info.description:
The Touhou Project series has a TON of awesome female characters! So what would happen if say...their breasts started growing? What would happen? How would they react? How would others react? This is a breast expansion interactive story detailing those events.

I'm giving 750 Gift Points to all quality additions!

Here are the rules:

1. Multiple girls are able to grow at once.

2. While this is a Breast Expansion focused story, Butt Expansion and GTS are allowed.

3. The stories for the characters can be either comedic and silly or serious.

4. For the sake of the story, please add a decent amount per chapter if you would like to post. If I notice a string of 1 or 2 sentence chapters, I will delete them for the sake of quality.

5. Please keep this story in English, and use decent grammar.

6. You can make the girls as big as you want, but please give detail and time for their growth. A.K.A, I do not want a character's breasts to go from normal to galaxy-sized in one chapter. (Basically no instant giga-size)

7. Not really a rule, but be creative! As long as you follow these rules, you can do anything!


Thanks for reading, enjoy the story, and while you're at it, why not ADD to it?


Psst! Interested in Fire Emblem and Breast Expansion? I have another interactive for that!
https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2180743-Fire-Emblem-Breast-Expansi...
